body:
Comment 6: 
Here is another example, where a comment next to an import gets shifted:

http://play.golang.org/p/vXaSQ_EUUg

Using version:

$ hg sum
parent: 632:4060450fb1fd tip
 godoc: Update identifier indexing tests.

Diff generated:

diff t.go gofmt/t.go
--- /tmp/gofmt391811836 2014-01-06 12:28:16.472004615 -0800
+++ /tmp/gofmt250759723 2014-01-06 12:28:16.472004615 -0800
@@ -1,7 +1,8 @@
 package main
 
 import (
-       "io" // I Am the Very Model of a Modern Major-General
+       "io"
+       "log" // I Am the Very Model of a Modern Major-General
 )
 
 var _ = io.Copy
